price: Şu halde yaratan, yaratamayan gibi olur mu? Artık siz düşünmez misiniz?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
